main.name: William Jarvis-Cross
main.bio: Hi! I am a fourth year undergraduate student at the University of Toronto, and I am completing a double major in computer science and astronomy and astrophysics as well as a minor in mathematics. Currently I work for Super (previously Snapcommerce), a commerce company dedicated to cater towards those left behind by credit companies. Outside of my studies, I enjoy learning about the intricacies of our Universe and staying physically active by playing various sports with friends.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to contact me here.

education.description: Graduating in 2024 with a double major in Computer Science and Astronomy and Astrophysics as well as a minor in Mathematics.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Developed features for new and current products along with conducted experiments to efficiently improve the business. Used JavaScript React, Node.js and Python.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
